channel.title: [PI] Drops don't show up for players? [PI]
channel.description:
I really need help...
I went on many other sites to try to find this..
Here is the issues: A player can drop items but the items never show up for the players to see them.. Now, some players made a report saying I killed someone and got there att cape. So then i thought only non tradeable items will show up and when you kill someone only non tradable items show..
Can someone please i beg you help me. The server base is 317 pi
